review: I recently visited Carrollwood Caf� & Deli, and I was thoroughly impressed. The food was delicious and fresh, with generous portions and a variety of options to choose from. The staff was friendly and attentive, making my dining experience enjoyable. The deli's clean and welcoming atmosphere added to the overall positive vibe. While the space can get a bit crowded during peak hours, it didn't detract from the quality of the food or service. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a great deli experience.
